properties.banditTestExplorer.testsuites: The configuration of your bandit test projects. Either a single JSON configuration object or a path to the JSON configuration file (relative to the workspace folder or absolute path).
properties.banditTestExplorer.parallelPr: The limit of parallel processes startet during a test run.
properties.banditTestExplorer.watchTimeo: A timeout in seconds that helps to prevent the auto run when watched files are compiled often.
properties.banditTestExplorer.allowKillP: Allows to hard kill running processes when a test run is cancelled or aborted.
properties.banditTestExplorer.logpanel: Enables the output of diagnostic logs to the integrated output panel.
properties.banditTestExplorer.logfile: Enables the output of diagnostic logs to the specified file if provided.
properties.banditTestExplorer.loglevel: The logging level used to filter notifications. All notifications of the same or higher level will be logged.
